Reviews.Title: Good Phone and price
Reviews.Author: steve mindek
Reviews.Content: Nice phone for me unlimited talk and does text nice. I do not like touch screens better for the younger gen,Can.t beat the price $49.95 and $25.00 per month unlimited if you can still get it.

Reviews.Title: Just Perfect
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: This phone has worked great with no problems at all, the call quality is great and it's easy to use and understand. The numbers are big to easily be seen and big bottons as well so anyone with big fingers won't have a problem using.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Layal
Reviews.Content: I liked this one.especially for people who dont text alot.easy to use and perfect look.i just bought this phone , happy with the features it has.they are not alot comparing to smart phones,at the end its a phone more for calls not for games and internet.

Reviews.Title: should have picked another one
Reviews.Author: Ed Bynum
Reviews.Content: few ringtone choices and very low volume even when set on high. Should have picked a different phone. next time, a smart phone

Reviews.Title: Yet Another Great Phone from Metro PCS
Reviews.Author: Michael Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I love it! I bought one for my Aunt & she loves it!  Great performance all the way around! She loves it better than her LG Select M180....especially since its takes up to an 32GB of external memory card.

ProductInfo.Features:
Display: 2.4-inches
Camera: 2-MP
Input: Keypad
OS: Other
ProductInfo.Name: Alcatel 768 (Metro PCS)
